I bought this product from Flipkart. I got this product delivered on 17 July 13:00 hours & writing this review on 18 July 11:45 hours i.e. not even 24 hours have passed. In this time, it has started showing several problems. The mouse is extremely disgusting. The cursor on my PC screen moves alone here & there even if none touches it. You cant watch a video or movie peacefully when the cursor moves alone here & there on your PC screen. Also the roller is irritating. It stops working sometimes & after sometimes it again works. Less than 24 hours have passed and it has brought me level of irritation. I suggest everyone not to buy it. It deserves 0.5 star, but there is no option of rating it 0.5 star, that's why I have given 1 star.

I wanted to give 0 stars review, but the system asks me to fill atleast 1 star.

The dell mouse which I have received, worked for the first time we connected to the computer.
Further, it did not work. I have sent the same review to the seller.

The seller asked me to return the product by courier.

Does it mean that I have to spend a few bucks to reach the courier centre and spend so more money on the courier charges, with a total expenditure coming close to Rs. 150 to get my mouse replaced which costed me Rs. 250?

Instead, I can purchase another mouse.

Thank you.
